sourcesContent:
export const portfolioData = [
    {
    title: 'logistics-software',
    subtitle: 'SOFTWARE | WEBSITES | APPS',
    bannerColor: 'primaryBlue-banner',
    layout: 'desktop',
    images: [
        {name: 'mobile-interfaces.png', width: 1200, height: 450}, 
        {name: 'dashboard-screen.png', width: 1200, height: 700},
        {name: 'messages-screen.png', width: 1200, height: 700},
        {name: 'tracking-screen.png', width: 1200, height: 700},
        {name: 'customs-screen.png', width: 1200, height: 700}
    ],
    description: 'The logistics software is a web based platform that tracks cargo shipped through land, sea, water, and air.  Providing information such as expected dates, current locations, cargo item details, shipping history statistics, routing information, document tracking, communication capabilities between all parties, and more. The customers who see this software for the first time often say "its futuristic!".'
    },

    {
        title: 'logistics-app',
        subtitle: 'MOBILE APP DEVELOPMENT & DESIGN',
        bannerColor: 'blue-purple-banner',
        layout: 'mobile',

        images: [
            {name: 'wwo_app_1.png', width: 400, height: 700}, 
            {name: 'wwo-shipment.png', width: 400, height: 700},
            {name: 'wwo_shipmentinfo.png', width: 400, height: 700},
      
        ],
        description: 'The logistics app allows users to track each shipment and communicate with their agents no matter where they are. With this new tool, both users and service providers improve in communication efforts as shipments are being moved across air, boat, domestic, and sea.'
    },

    {
        title: 'dashboard',
        subtitle: 'METRICS DASHBOARD | UI DEVELOPMENT',
        bannerColor: 'blue-purple-banner',
        layout: 'desktop',
        images: [
            {name: 'dashboard.png', width: 800, height: 800},
            {name: 'red-chart.png', width: 800, height: 600},
            {name: 'barchart.png', width: 800, height: 600},
            {name: 'mixedchart.png', width: 1200, height: 500},

        ],
        description: 'The dashboard was developed with canvasJS, HTML, and the Materialize Styling Framework. This project was designed to provide a visual of several KPIs within the company to better understand each agents performance and show overal performance in key areas'
    },
]
